I also get it that they have made a name for themselves from the food trucks but come on,I literally finished my sandwich in 3 bites!

If you come to Las Vegas you have to try this place out, staff is friendly  ( they should be because this place is slightly expensive ) but it is very good... I took an Uber there twice to eat. It is in the middle of a mall, which is kind of ratchet but never less it's VEGAS!!!! Don't over order though because seafood wasn't meant to sit in a hotel. ( please don't get sick trying to store seafood)
We just arrived to Vegas and we decided to come here for our first meal. SATISFYING. We ordered the lobster man n cheese and surf and turf philly.

Not as good as expected....bisque was meh...very creamy not strong lobster taste. Tasted like lobster but just not as much as I would've liked. Lobster salad was very small, they should just add more lettuce and veggies, it was more like lobster pieces on bed of lettuce than a salad. Lobster roll was good but lobster pieces were not as large as I saw in photos. Service was slow and not rude but neither efficient nor overly friendly.

split the CT roll w. my friend. we added the chowder fries and drink to make a meal of it. I had iced coffee already so I let him have the drink.  Our total was $25+ kind of on the pricier side, but it's LOBSTER!  I wish the CT roll was a tad bit bigger. I didn't like how the lobster was minced up so small, but it was tasty. Bread was extra buttery. Chowder fries were amazing though. Whoever thought to put chowder over fries is a genius.

Lobster? When do I eat Lobster other than at big Chinese dinners at a restaurant.  In Vegas!!! I came here because I was definitely hungry, wanted something quick , easy to eat, and most importantly something DELICIOUS!. Can you go wrong with Lobster??? Yes of course you can. But for me, I shared the LOBSTER bisque and Mac and Cheese. The Lobster Bisque in the bowl was good. I especially love the bread bowl with it. The bowl was fully edible, soft but crispy. On the other hand the Mac and Cheese was a bit of a disappointment. They totally trick you in the container they put it in! Lift it up and you'll notice that its only half the size of the container!!! WTFF!!! It wasn't even cheesy! The Cheese wasn't melty either and was pretty dry. But I won't complain, I still ate it because macaroni and cheese is still a good combination. I definitely want to try the Rolls next time ;)
Disappointed  The pictures make it look good, but for the price you pay , it's not worth it !!!  Save your money and skip this place !
Maine lobster roll, lobster mac & cheese , lobster ME.. Yummy! A must when in Vegas every time any day! Seriously ^.^ never disappoints

Lobster ME. Lobster YOU. Lobster ALL US.  The Lobster Bisque with Bread Bowl was a perfect snack for Jesse and I. It was delicious, creamy, and had lots of Lobster chunks in it. If you stayed at PH hotel, you can order it to go, and eat it in your room. That's what we did, Lobster Bisque + Bellagio fountain view = a perfect afternoon in Vegas before taking a nap.

Located in the Venetian hotel, lies the most tender, juicy lobster shack around! They have everything lobster. Lobster subs, lobster sandwiches, lobster mac and cheese, lobsicles and much more! Whatever you're craving, they got it. What I love about this place is that they do not skimp you on lobster. Everything I've tried had huge chucks of lobster. Never dry, and always very flavourful. They serve their flavours a few different ways so you can have it how you like. The only thing that I do not like is how pricey it is! 1 lobster sub and 1 chowder...about $40 bucks. Better be winning big if you're pigging out here with the family!
5 stars for sure.  Excellent food and service. Absolutely scrumptious and very good service., especially for fast food.  Super fresh salad and amazing presentation.  Yum yum.

I loved this place! Heard it from a few friends of mines and it was highly recommended, and there was no shortage of lobster! So much so that I nearly tapped out on finishing the lobster Mac and cheese on top of my lobster bisque and lobster roll
